extendedInfo.description: Direct Digital for College Stores e-Reader provides instructors and students the ability to read their digital textbooks, access additional learning tools and resources available through the app.Features:â¢       Flexible navigation with page swiping, an interactive TOC, and the ability to jump to specific pagesâ¢       Easy to use interface that mirrors the online reading experienceâ¢       Support for highlights, notes, and bookmarksâ¢       A complete dictionary accessible in the context of readingâ¢       Reflowable text and page fidelity view optionsâ¢       Contextualized study tools and learning resourcesSearch support for all book content as well as user annotationsTested and approved for the following devices: Asus Tablets TF101 and TF201, Samsung Galaxy Tab 2.0, Samsung Galaxy S2, S3 and S4, Galaxy NexusSCH-I515
